review: I think ROKU is doing a better job a UI.  I bought this for use mainly with computer in basement stream music to the apple tv.  It works well for that.  I think the computer connected right to my sound system actually sound a little better but this is easier and less noisy in the living room compared to running a full PC.  Example of what I think is rediculous is watching netflix with it and having to back out of so many screens if you want to go back to some other function.
